author: hibou
msg: Since now the container state is more relyably restored, change the default "resolve on startup" to "do nothing"

author: ihabunek
msg: Removed usage of register_shutdown_function which was used instead of  a distructor in LoggerAppender. This function yielded some unexpected and undesirable behaviour.

author: maartenc
msg: FIX: Memory leak and infinite loop in ModuleId.java (IVY-1362)

author: ihabunek
msg: Set class="external" on all external links. Removed target="_blank", this is added dynamically in site.js.

author: maartenc
msg: - FIX: Unnecessary warning when parent ivy.xml is not found (IVY-1346)
- FIX: StackOverflowError when using <extends> and ../ivy.xml is not the parent ivy.xml (IVY-1437)
